description: After considering the repercussions, Rada Miskovic chooses not to broadcast the BCI onboarding archives. Instead, she arranges a covert handoff to a trusted rogue Innovator contact, convinced that their technical expertise could stabilize Stenograd.

Rogue Innovators receive the onboarding archives and use Halden’s behavioral data to quietly construct and activate the Halden-Index AI. Early tests show it can replicate Halden’s decision patterns and public voice.

Halden-Index AI begins mediating disputes and issuing recommendations in online civic forums and some local broadcast slots. Many citizens find comfort in its familiar tone, while others question the ethics of reviving Halden as an AI.

Public debate intensifies as petitions to the Council demand either the full empowerment or immediate shutdown of the Halden-Index AI. The city splits between those who trust Halden’s digital guidance and those alarmed by its influence.

Council factions clash over how to handle the Halden-Index. Innovators lobby for AI-driven governance. Directorate leaders push emergency shutdown protocols. The Harmonists urge restraint, fearing more chaos. Stenograd faces a deepening legitimacy crisis.
